20504.「よう ジェイコフ。\n その若いのが ウワサの新しい弟子かい？:
Hey, Jakov. Is that young man your new
apprentice?

20506.「これは これは ゴードンさん。\n 相変わらず お元気そうで なによりですな。:
Well, well, well, Mr. Gordon. I'm glad to see
that you are as healthy as ever. And how can I
help you today?

20508.「んだぁっ！？\n テメーは アニキに聞かれたことにだけ\n 答えてりゃあいいん:
What? You only answer what you're asked by
your brother!

20510.「ハハ…… こりゃ すみません。\n ええ。おっしゃる通り こいつが\n 新しい:
Ha ha... Sorry about this. Sorry about that.
You were right. This is my new apprentice,
<pc>.

20512.「ほらっ。オメーも ゴードンさんに\n ごあいさつしねえか！: Come on. You too, say hello to Gordon!

20514.「ああ いい いい。……で 約束通り\n こいつを モンスター勝ち抜きバトルの\:
Oh, good, good. So... we're going to put him
in the ring for the Monster Championship, like
we promised, right?

20515.「はい それはもう！ こいつが 戦って\n 借金が チャラになるんなら\n 何百:
Yes, that's it! If he can clear his debt by
fighting, I'll let him fight hundreds or
thousands of times.

20516.「あんたも カネにだらしない師匠を\n 持っちまって 災難だよなぁ。\n ククク:
It's a pity that you also have a master who is
sloppy with money. Kukuku... I feel for you
from the bottom of my heart.

20517.「モンスター勝ち抜きバトルってーと\n ブランドン様のペットたちと 戦うのかよ？:
Monster battle of the winners...against Master
Brandon's pets? Poor little guy...

20518.「……いいだろう。こいつなら\n 中年バトルマスターを戦わせるより\n 客も 呼:
That's fine. This guy will bring in more
customers than having a middle-aged battle
master fight.

20519.「せいぜい いい仕事をして 盛り上げてくれよ。\n 受け付けは いつも通り クラ:
Do a good job and keep it lively. Clark will
take care of the reception as usual, so please
let him through.

20520.「全国１０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま\n たいへん お待たせしました！\n:
To the 10 million fans of the Coliseum, here
we go again! Today, the bloody feast is about
to begin again!

20521.「コロシアムの裏名物 モンスター勝ち抜き戦！\n 今夜の挑戦者は 若きバトルマス:
It's the backstage specialty of the Coliseum, the Monster Winner's Tournament! Tonight's challenger is the young battle master
.

20522.<if_woman>「はたして 彼女は 無事に\n リングを下りることが できる:
<if_woman>Will she make it out of the ring in one piece?
The hour of doom is drawing nearer and nearer.<else>Will He make it out of the ring in one piece?
The hour of doom is drawing nearer and nearer.<endif>

20523.「見事 イエティを倒した\n <pc>選手。あと１勝。\n あと１勝すれば 勝利:
Well done <pc> for defeating Powie
Yowie. One more win. One more win and the
glory of victory is yours!

20524.<if_woman>「しかし 立ちはだかるカベは あまりに高い。\n ３回戦の相:
<if_woman>But the obstacles in her way are too high, and
her opponent in the third round is the Knight
Errant. How will she fight this opponent?<else>But the obstacles in his way are too high, and
his opponent in the third round is the Knight
Errant. How will he fight this opponent?<endif>

20526.「なんと！ なんと！ なんと！\n 今日のバトルが 始まる前に\n 誰が この結:
Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Who would
have predicted this outcome before today's
battle began?

20527.「私は 今 新たなコロシアムの伝説の誕生に\n 立ち会っているのかもしれません。:
I may now be witnessing the birth of a new
Coliseum legend. Thanks for the inspiration,
<pc> players!

20529.「ただいま入った情報では\n 控えで用意していた モンスター３体が\n オリを破:
We have just received information that three
of the monsters we had in reserve have broken
through the cage and escaped.

20530.「まずいぞ！ まずいぞぉ！\n <pc>選手 あぶなぁ～～～い！！:
This is not good! This is not good!
<pc> Watch out!

20532.「これは いったい どうしたことだ！？\n 突如 現れた 仮面の男が ３体の魔物:
What the hell is going on? A masked man
suddenly appeared and defeated three monsters
in an instant!

20533.「……と とにかく サプライズ続きの\n 本日の モンスター勝ち抜き戦でしたが\:
...and anyway, today's monster winner's
tournament was full of surprises, but we'll
leave it at that!

20534.「ンフフフフ……。\n じつに 見事な 勝ちっぷりでしたねぇ。\n 私 あなたの:
That was a very impressive win. I've become
your Fan Fan.

20535.「それにしても あの仮面の男……\n どうやら バトルマスターだったようなので\:
But still, that masked man...it seems he was a
battle master, so let's call him "Mask Buster"
for short.

20536.「彼は いったい 何者なんでしょうねぇ？\n あの後 係員たちが 探したのですが:
Who the hell is he? The staff members searched
for him afterwards, but they couldn't find him
anywhere.

20537.「あれほどの実力を持ちながら\n 正体を隠し 姿をくらますなんて\n よほど 後:
Is he really that dark, that he could be so
powerful and yet hide his true identity and
disappear?

20538.「ンフフフフ……。\n あなたといい 仮面バスターといい\n やはり コロシアム:
I'm sure the Coliseum is very exciting, just
like you and the masked buster.

20539.「おお よくやってくれたな！\n オメーの活躍は見せてもらってたぜ。\n おかげ:
Oh, you did good! I've been following your
exploits. Thanks to you, my debt is wiped out.
Guffaw...

20540.「これは 師匠からの ごほうびだ。\n ありがたく 受け取るがいいぞ。:
This is a reward from the master. Accept it
gratefully.

20541.「オメーの はたらきには\n これからも期待してるからな。\n オレの言うことを:
I'll be counting on you to do your work from
now on. I'm counting on you to do your best.

20542.「いきなり モンスター勝ち抜き戦に\n 放り込むなんて 相変わらず\n 弟子使い:
It seems that you still have a rough pupil to
throw him into the monster competition out of
the blue.

20543.「ゲゲッ！ テメーは セインズ……。\n 今さら 何しに現れやがった！？:
Geez! You, Sainz... what the hell are you
doing here?

20544.「あんたが 新しい弟子をとったと聞いて\n 様子を見にきたんですよ。\n 元弟子:
I heard that you had taken on a new apprentice, so I came to check on you. As a former apprentice, I couldn't leave it at
that.

20545.「お前さんが <pc>か。\n モンスター勝ち抜き戦 見せてもらったよ。\n な:
So you're <pc>. I've been watching
your Monster Winner's Tournament. You seem to
have a pretty good point.

20546.「しかし こんな師匠を持っちまって\n 苦労するよなぁ……オレなんて\n 途中で:
But it must be hard to have such a master... I
had to give up halfway through.

20547.「まあ 何かあったら この不肖の先輩が\n 相談にのるからよ。\n くじけずに:
Well, if you have any problems, my senior will
be here to help you. Don't be discouraged and
do your best.

20548.「……ケッ！ \n 師匠不孝モンが 先輩風 吹かせやがって！:
Damn it! You filial son of a bitch! You're
making me out to be a senior!

20549.「ああ 胸クソ悪い。\n 今日はもう 寝ちまうことにするぜ！:
Oh, I'm so sick of this. I'm gonna go to sleep
now!

60355.「１回戦の相手は あばれこまいぬ。\n この残忍かつ 凶暴な魔物を相手に\n <:
The opponent in the first round is Foo Dog.
How will <pc> fight against this
brutal and ferocious monster?

60357.「見事 あばれこまいぬを倒した\n <pc>選手。\n しかし その苦難は まだ:
<pc> defeated Foo Dog with flying
colors. However, his hardship continues.

60358.<if_woman>「２回戦の相手は イエティ。\n この 恐るべき怪物を相手に:
<if_woman>The opponent in the second round is the Powie
Yowie. Will her skills be up to the task
against this fearsome monster?<else>The opponent in the second round is the Powie
Yowie. Will his skills be up to the task
against this fearsome monster?<endif>
